verse.lines: {lang-eng}Face to face with Christ, my Savior, Face to face- what will it be? When with rapture I behold Him, Jesus Christ who died for me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Only faintly now, I see Him, With the darkling veil between, But a blessed day is coming, When His glory shall be seen.{/lang-eng}
